author: PTI
title: Coronavirus | U.K. plans curfews if social distancing rules ignored
description: The warning comes as Parliament is set to speed through emergency legislation that would grant powers aimed at tackling the rapidly spreading coronavirus pandemic, with 5,683 confirmed cases and 281 deaths in the U.K.
content: The U.K. government on Monday warned that tougher lock-down measures, including curfews akin to those in place in other European countries such as France and Italy, would have to be enforced to limit the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19) if selfish people … [+3530 chars]
